backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in‑canister storage for products, orders, inquiries, carousel slides, user profiles, and site content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing files and components relevant to overriding the logo button background style.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, and admin modules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout wrapper, and triggers profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin tool to view, upload, optimize, reorder, and update carousel slide images and links.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Manages category carousel slides, including uploading/optimizing images, editing URLs, toggling visibility, and reordering slots. Uses backend mutations to save updated slide data.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Displays customer inquiries and allows admins to send responses via a simple text interface. Supports viewing message details and marking inquiries as answered.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Shows customer orders with status controls, product lookup, and formatted pricing/date helpers. Supports updating order status and printing detailed order sheets.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products with fields for details and media, including optimized image/video uploads and preview management. Handles both new product creation and updating existing media.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Displays the product inventory list with CRUD controls for adding, editing, and deleting products. Integrates the product form modal and shows product thumbnails with formatted pricing.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form for loading, editing, and saving site-wide contact details and static content via hooks.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Category carousel component with auto-rotation, hover pause, slide transitions, and enabled-slide filtering.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wrapper component adding a data attribute to scope customer-facing page styles.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Renders a split-layout footer showing branding, contact info, policy links, and optional footer text.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Homepage 16:9 carousel with auto-rotation, hover pause, directional slide transitions, and enabled-slide filtering.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with header, auth handling, cart badge, navigation, scroll shrink behavior, and route outlet.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal showing order details, status, pricing, and supports order cancellation with reasons.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Carousel displaying product images and video with navigation arrows and slide switching.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving initial user profile info with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Skeleton-based loading placeholder for lazy-loaded routes.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file for Stripe setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Adds and removes a body attribute to enable admin-specific styling when mounted.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for cart items with persistence, providing add, remove, update, and total calculation methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Returns a fixed footer variant value of 'split' with no state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, carousel slides, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and an extensive set of CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including brand color palettes and UI styling tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with access control, stats summaries, and management tabs for products, orders, inquiries, content, and carousels.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's cart with item management, price formatting, and navigation to checkout or browsing.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a two-step checkout flow for address and payment, auto-filling profile data and creating orders for each cart item.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated inquiry submission form that sends customer messages to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Renders the customer dashboard with order and inquiry data, authentication checks, and an order detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage carousels and product grid with add‑to‑cart and buy‑now actions gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, media carousel, and cart or purchase interactions with authentication checks.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Provides client‑side image resizing/compression and basic video preview generation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session‑stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, containers, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including schema version, existing features, and a pending header update request. Tracks project metadata and clarification settings.
